text: Lal Bahadur Shastri (, , 2 October 1904 â€“ 11 January 1966) was an Indian politician. He was the 2nd Prime Minister of India from 1964 to 1966. He was a senior leader of the Indian National Congress political party. Shastri died on 11 January 1966 in Tashkent, Soviet Union from a heart attack at the age of 61. Many people believed that there was a conspiracy to his death and that he was murdered. ==References== Category:1904 births Category:1966 deaths Category:Politicians from Uttar Pradesh Category:Prime Ministers of India
title: Lal Bahadur Shastri
